snippet.title: Guilty - Takiko's Nightmare Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
Guilty - Takiko's Nightmare is a story-based game about a teenager named Takiko.

Available on Windows, Mac and Android
Get the game demo on Itch.io: https://theflavare.itch.io/guilty-takiko-s-nightmare

Takiko is a teenage girl. Her grades suddenly drop and sometimes she spends time in her room with empty looks. The parents are getting worried about what is wrong with her. They decided to bring Takiko to a psychiatrist. The psychiatrist took action by doing hypnotherapy to make Takiko relax and close her eyes. But, everything change after she open her eyes.   

In order to improve this game, any feedback is really appreciated.
